LanguageData.WakeUpAddiction.label: 웨이크업 중독
LanguageData.WakeUpAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to wake-up. Long-term presence of wake-up has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of wake-up, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.WakeUpAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: 금단현상
LanguageData.WakeUpHigh.label: 웨이크업에 취함
LanguageData.WakeUpHigh.description: 웨이크업에 취했습니다. 뇌를 자극하여 피로를 풀어줍니다.
LanguageData.WakeUpTolerance.label: 웨이크업 내성
LanguageData.WakeUpTolerance.description: 웨이크업에 내성이 생겼습니다. 이 수치가 클수록 동일한 효과를 얻기 위해서는 더 많은 웨이크업이 필요합니다.
LanguageData.WakeUpTolerance.stages.small.label: 작음
LanguageData.WakeUpTolerance.stages.large.label: 큼
LanguageData.WakeUpTolerance.stages.massive.label: 심각함
